Might I suggest using DVDShrink to re-author the dvd and keep just the title, ditch the menus.  Keep the 5.1 and subs and keep a better compression ratio?  Quality over quantity!  I'd rather have a better quality movie and no menu as I'm sure most would.  Granted, if you can keep all and still come in at 100% compression ratio then do it, otherwise, the movie should take priority.

BTW, thanks for the upload.
